name: Cyril's Silly Show
description: If you need a description, you don't need to use this.

blackCards.text: ______ drew fanart of ______ fucking Cyril in the butt.
On tonight's Silly Show, tune in to hear Cyril read a clopfic about ______ being shipped with ______.
Cyril once ripped off his shirt on stage revealing _______.
